content:
I like to keep it simple and use a drizzle of olive oil, salt, and pepper. Sometimes I'll add some garlic powder or paprika for extra flavor. I've also been meaning to try out some new spices and seasonings, so if you have any recommendations, I'd love to hear them!

And yeah, I've been wanting to try out some new vegetables and ingredients. I've heard great things about Brussels sprouts and kale, so I might try roasting those next. Do you have any favorite ways of preparing those veggies?
